import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import SmallCard from './SmallCard'; function ContentRowTotales(props) { const [books, setBooks] = useState(''); const [users, setUsers] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost:3030/API/books/') .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => setBooks(data.meta.total)) .catch(e => console.log(e)) }, []) useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost:3030/API/users/list') .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => setUsers(data.data.count)) .catch(e => console.log(e)) }, []) return (
Total de libros
Total de libros
{props.count}
 ) } export default ContentRowTotales;
